member.name: T:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter
member.summary: Wraps a log4net logger under the interface.

member.name: M:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Automatically configures log4net and creates a log4net logger from this namespace. Refer to constructor overload for default values.

member.name: M:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter.#ctor(log4net.ILog)
member.summary: Creates a writer with a valid log4net logger. Defaults to equal to and equal to False.

member.name: M:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter.Write(Omniscient.Foundation.Logging.LogEntry)
member.summary: Writes a log entry to the underlying log4net logger.

member.name: P:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets the level under which no logs will make it to the underlying log4net logger.

member.name: P:Omniscient.Foundation.Contrib.Logging.Log4NetWriter.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the writer is enabled or not. If not, nothing will be logged.
